      public Player getCurrentPlayer()
      This method is used to fetch the player whose turn it is for issuing the order.
      Returns:
      the value of the player who will issue the order.

    • onAssignReinforcementPhase

      public void onAssignReinforcementPhase() throws GameLoopIllegalStateException
      Throws:
      GameLoopIllegalStateException

    • onStartExecuteOrderPhase

      public void onStartExecuteOrderPhase() throws GameLoopIllegalStateException
      This method is used to starts the game loop state: execute order. This gets the order of the player and executes it using the type of order.
      Throws:
      GameLoopIllegalStateException - is Thrown if the engine tries to jump to an illegal state.

    • onStartIssueOrderPhase

      public void onStartIssueOrderPhase() throws GameLoopIllegalStateException
      This method begins the issue orders phase. It requests all players to issue orders until all of the players have placed all their reinforcement armies on the map. In case the player issues an order with reinforcements more than they possess, it will request the same player again for a valid order.
      Throws:
      GameLoopIllegalStateException - Throws if the engine tries to jump to illegal state.

    • startGameLoop

      public void startGameLoop()
      This method begins the thread to iterate through various states of the game.

    • shutdown

      public void shutdown()
      This method shuts the GameEngine
      Specified by:
      shutdown in interface Engine
